pages.text: $(item)Dense Quartz$() can be found by harvesting $(item)Dense Quartz Ore$() deposits with, at minimum, an $(thing)Iron-Tier Pickaxe$().$(p)$(info) $(thing)Tools$() made from $(item)Dense Quartz$() have unique properties.
$(item)Dense Quartz$() can be shattered with a pickaxe on an $(item)Anvil$() to procure $(item)Quartz$().
